name: Escape: Stern Hall
description:
You wake up alone and drenched in sweat, realizing that you are trapped inside the building of Stern Hall, Stanford. The path out is not easy though, as you must find ways to avoid deadly smoke and other obstacles which may face your path throughout your escape.

Controls:

Movement in 4 Directions - WASD

Quitting the Game - ESC + P

Grab/Use Items - Left Click

Throw Items - Right Click
